description:
Protect the floor of your MSR Tent and extend the life of your tent, this footprint is designed to better protect your tent from wear-and-tear. Compatible with MSR Zoic 2, Remote 2, Guideline Pro 2 or Hubba Tour 2 tents.

  • Sized to fit the floor of the your MSR Tent and designed so it doesn't channel rain underneath
  • Dimensions: 216 x 130cm
name: MSR Universal 2 Large Footprint
